IMEAN(6D)                                             IMEAN(6D)





NAME
       imean - find the average pixel value of an image

SYNOPSIS
       imean inimage

DESCRIPTION
       imean  finds  the  average pixel value of inimage. imean
       prints the average RGB color of all the  pixels  in  the
       image to stdout.

SEE ALSO
       hist(6D)



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004                 IMEAN(6D)
